> 1iT is a leading Israeli IT support services provider, offering advanced computing, communication, cybersecurity, and infrastructure solutions for businesses. With over 30 years of experience, we provide proactive maintenance, cloud services, server infrastructure, and tailored IT solutions. Our strategic partnerships with Microsoft, Google, Acronis, SentinelOne, and Fortinet ensure top-tier services for startups, high-tech firms, law offices, and more.

# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About 1iT
1iT is a leading Israeli IT support services provider, offering advanced computing, communication, cybersecurity, and infrastructure solutions for businesses. With over 30 years of experience, we provide proactive maintenance, cloud services, server infrastructure, and tailored IT solutions. Our strategic partnerships with Microsoft, Google, Acronis, SentinelOne, and Fortinet ensure top-tier services for startups, high-tech firms, law offices, and more.

## Services/Products
- Hardware & Software for All Your IT Needs
- Proactive IT Support
- Consulting & Deployment
- Custom IT Solutions
- Cloud Services
- Server Infrastructure
- Cybersecurity
- Communication Solutions

## Target Audience
customers seeking IT infrastructure solutions

## Industry
IT Services
